short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report bad ads when you see them on CardGames.io. Sends an error report with a screenshot.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a companion extension for the web site https://cardgames.io. Sometimes there are ads shown on the site that interfere with the games, causing performance issues and other problems. This extension adds a link below each ad, with the text "Report Ad". When you click on the link you'll get a dialog where you can enter some information about the ad that's causing the problems, and an automatic screenshot of the ad and some technical information about it will be sent to cardgames.io, so we can more easily find the ad in question and block it.
